content: :tada: Happy new year, folks. Are you interested in getting involved in TinyGo and Big Go support for WebAssembly and WASI? We have a #wit-bindgen-go Gopher Slack channel and #SIG-Guest-Languages for that! It's part of the Bytecode Alliance SIG Guest Language Go subgroup and we hold biweekly meetings to discuss projects like go-modules, TinyGo and the Big Go support for Wasm/WASI. We'd love to have you involved!
